title: Billy Don Burns Hospitalized After Self-Inflicted Stabbing Incident
description: Country music outlaw Billy Don Burns is recovering after stabbing himself while under the influence. The incident has shocked the Nashville community and raised concerns about addiction and mental health in the industry.
content: Billy Don Burns is a name synonymous with outlaw grit and lived-in storytelling. The country music veteran is recovering in the hospital after a terrifying incident in which he stabbed himself multip… [+1997 chars]
